title: Ivan Hammerschlag-chaired dairy nutrition business seeks ASX listing
text:
A New Zealand dairy nutrition business chaired by retail bigwig Ivan Hammerschlag is seeking to raise $20 million from equities investors to list on the ASX-boards with a $50 million market capitalisation.

Happy Valley Nutrition, located in the Waikato region, is developing a nutritional grade, vertically integrated milk processing, blending and canning plan, which will be a B2B supplier of consumer ready infant milk formula and other nutritional milk powder formulas.

Brokers Bell Potter Securities and Shaw and Partners have been hired to oversee the deal.
